data.message: Thank you to Sibcy Cline Relo Services President Robin Sheakley for an awesome event tonight! #LindnerPride

from.name: Carl H. Lindner College of Business Student Action Team

data.message:
You're Invited!
TONIGHT, Robin Sheakley, President of Sibcy Cline Relocation Services, will be speaking to students!
Take this opportunity to meet a leader from the Cincinnati business community. Ms. Robin Sheakley will be speaking to students about leadership in business and keys to being successful. 

This event will take place from 6:00 PM - 6:45 PM in the Lindner College of Business Room 608. 

You do not need to register for this event in advance. All students are welcome and encouraged to attend!
